titleStmt.title: Chauncey McKeever to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG12068

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: 1st - 20th Regiments Kentucky Infantry Primary Source Documents

body.p:
3d 4
Adjutant General's Office,
Washington, November 24th 1863.
To His Excellency,
The Governor of Kentucky
Sir:

I have the honor to report, that the following named Officers of the Volunteer forces from the State of Kentucky have been discharged at the dates, and for the causes, set opposite their respective names, viz:
dishon'g ✓ dismissed Second Lieut Abram P. Brown ✓ 3 Regt Oct 23 1863
" ✓ " Captain J. F Wisnewski ✓ 2 " " 23 "
" ✓ " Lieut Jno. D. Lanshan ✓ 15 " " 23 "
" ✓ " Major Kalfus ✓ 15 " " 23 "
" ✓ " Second Lieut Geo A Richardson ✓ 6 Cavy " 23 "
" ✓ " Captain Geo A. Little ✓ 17 Regt " 23 "
" ✓ " Second Lieut Oscar D. Kress ✓ 17 " " 23 "

I am Sir very respectfully Your Obt. Servant.
Chauncey McKeever
Asst Adjt General.

No 1 2 3
Washington City Report
Resigs
Filed 5th Decr 1863
